Class DefaultBeanResolutionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.context.DefaultBeanResolutionContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanResolutionContext, ValueResolver<CharSequence>

    @Internal
public final class DefaultBeanResolutionContext
extends Object
implements BeanResolutionContext
    Default implementation of the BeanResolutionContext interface.

    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
